title: MasternodeBTC
author: MasternodeBTC
created_time: April 16, 2023, 06:37:05 AMLast edit: May 10, 2023, 09:49:42 AM by MasternodeBTC
content: The sustainable energieefficient blockchain based on Masternode and POS with a max supply of 21 million coins and halving each 210k blocks and a blocktime of 5 minutes!Hello Bitcointalk community,We are thrilled to announce MasternodeBTC (MNBTC), a novel cryptocurrency designed with sustainability, efficiency, and longevity in mind. MNBTC is a blockchain-based coin that operates through a combination of Masternode and Proof-of-Stake (PoS) mechanisms, ensuring a low-energy, efficient network.Key Features of MNBTC:Sustainability: Our blockchain protocol utilizes a combination of Masternodes and PoS, promoting a significant reduction in energy consumption compared to traditional Proof-of-Work systems.Deflationary Model: The maximum supply of MNBTC is set at 21 million coins. With a halving event planned for every 210k blocks and a block time of 5 minutes, we aim to foster long-term price growth through a deflationary model.Fixed Collateral: We have set a fixed collateral of 2000 MNBTC for Masternodes, providing stability and predictability to our network participants.Future-Proof: We plan to continuously innovate and adapt to the dynamic crypto market by merging other coins into MNBTC in the long run.We have chosen to forego a presale, believing in a fair and transparent launch. Instead, MNBTC will be listed directly on the xeggex exchange. We are confident that the principles of supply and demand will determine a fair price for MNBTC, and we expect the returns to decrease sustainably in the long term.For more information about MNBTC, our vision, and roadmap, please visit our Linktree: https://linktr.ee/masternodebtcWe look forward to your feedback, questions, and discussion around this exciting new chapter in cryptocurrency. Together, we can shape a future where digital currencies harmonize with our shared sustainability goals.Best regards,The MNBTC TeamWebsite: https://mn-btc.com Discord: https://discord.gg/2F67SNssbV Telegram: https://t.me/masternodebtc
